Verses: 1 ivai Ellaavatraiyum Naan En Manadhile Vagaiyarukkumpadikku Sindhiththen; Needhimaangalum Gnaanigalum Thangal Kiriyaigaludan, Dhevanudaiya Kaivasamaayirukkiraargal; Thanakku Mun Irukkiravargalaikkondu Oruvanum Viruppaiyaavadhu Veruppaiyaavadhu Ariyaan.

2 ellaarukkum Ellaam Orevidhamaai Sambavikkum; Sanmaarkkanukkum Dhunmaarkkanukkum, Nargunamum Suththamumullavanukkum Suththamillaadhavanukkum, Paliyidugiravanukkum Paliyidaadhavanukkum, Orevidhamaai Sambavikkum; Nallavanukku Eppadiyo Pollaadhavanukkum Appadiye; Aanaiyidugiravanukkum Aanaiyida Bayappadugiravanukkum Samamaai Sambavikkum.

3 ellaarukkum Orevidhamaai Sambavikkiradhu Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Nadakkiradhellaavatrilum Viseshiththa Theengaam; Aadhalaal Manupuththirarin Irudhayam Theemaiyaal Niraindhirukkiradhu; Avargal Uyirodirukkum Naalalavum Avargal Irudhayam Paiththiyankondirundhu, Pinbu Avargal Seththavargalidaththirkup Pogiraargal.
4 idharku Neengalaayirukkiravan Yaar? Uyirodirukkira Anaivaridaththilum Nambikkaiyundu; Seththa Singaththaippaarkkilum Uyirulla Naai Vaasi.
5 uyirodirukkiravargal Thaangal Marippadhai Arivaargale, Mariththavargal Ondrum Ariyaargal; Ini Avargalukku Oru Palanumillai, Avargal Per Mudhalaai Marakkappattirukkiradhu.
6 avargal Snegamum, Avargal Pagaiyum, Avargal Poraamaiyum Ellaam Ozhindhupoyitru; Sooriyanukkuk Keezheseyyappadugiradhondrilum Avargalukku Ini Endraikkum Pangillai.
7 nee Poi, Un Aagaaraththai Sandhoshaththudan Pusiththu, Un Dhraatcharasaththai Manamagizhchchiyudan Kudi; Dhevan Un Kiriyaigalai Angeegaarampanniyirukkiraar.
8 un Vasthirangal Eppozhudhum Vellaiyaayum, Un Thalaikku Enney Kuraiyaadhadhaayum Iruppadhaaga.

9 sooriyanukkukkeezhe Dhevan Unakku Niyamiththirukkira Maayaiyaana Naatkalilellaam Nee Nesikkira Manaiviyode Nilaiyillaadha Indha Jeevavaazhvai Anubavi; Indha Jeevanukkuriya Vaazhvilum, Nee Sooriyanukkukkeezhe Padugira Prayaasaththilum Pangu Idhuve.
10 seyyumpadi Un Kaikku Neridugiradhu Edhuvo, Adhai Un Belaththode Sey; Nee Pogira Paadhaalaththile Seygaiyum Viththaiyum Arivum Gnaanamum Illaiye.

11 naan Thirumbikkondu Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Kandadhaavadhu: Odugiradharku Vegamullavargalin Vegamum, Yuththaththukku Savuriyavaangalin Savuriyamum Podhaadhu; Pizhaippukku Gnaanamullavargalin Gnaanamum Podhaadhu; Aisuvariyamadaigiradharku Buththimaangalin Buththiyum Podhaadhu; Dhayavu Adaigiradharku Viththuvaangalin Arivum Podhaadhu; Avargalellaarukkum Samayamum Dhevachcheyalum Neridavendum.

12 than Kaalaththai Manushan Ariyaan; Machchangal Kodiya Valaiyil Adappaduvadhupolavum, Kuruvigal Kanniyil Pidipaduvadhupolavum, Manupuththirar Pollaadhakaalaththile Sadidhiyil Thangalukku Neridum Aabaththil Adappaduvaargal.
13 sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Gnaanamulla Kaariyaththaiyum Kanden; Adhu En Paarvaikkup Peridhaaith Thondritru.
14 oru Siru Pattanam Irundhadhu, Adhile Irundha Kudigal Konja Manidhar; Adharku Virodhamaai Oru Periya Raajaa Vandhu, Adhai Valaindhukondu, Adharku Edhiraagap Periya Koththalangalaik Kattinaan.
15 adhile Gnaanamulla Oru Ezhai Manidhan Irundhaan; Avan Than Gnaanaththinaale Andhap Pattanaththai Viduviththaan; Aanaalum Andha Ezhai Manidhanai Oruvarum Ninaikkavillai.
16 aagaiyaal Ezhaiyin Gnaanam Asattaipannappattu, Avan Vaarththaigal Ketkappadaamarponaalum, Belaththaippaarkkilum Gnaaname Uththamam Endren.
17 moodarai Aalum Adhipadhiyin Kookkuralaippaarkkilum Gnaanigaludaiya Amarikkaiyaana Vaarththaigale Ketkappadaththakkavaigal.
18 yuththa Aayudhangalaippaarkkilum Gnaaname Nalam; Paaviyaana Oruvan Migundha Nanmaiyaik Keduppaan.
